name: The Arbor, Forest Of Wolves
description: Chapter 1: Located near the 'Outside the Forest' Shrine. After passing through a cave, you'll find this spot within a dilapidated wooden structure overlooking a cliff.

name: The Cavern, Bamboo Grove
description: Chapter 1: Near the 'Back Hills' Shrine. Descend the stairs, turn left, and enter a cave where a non-hostile NPC resides; the Meditation Spot is inside.

name: The Cliff, Black Wind Cave
description: Chapter 1: After defeating the Whiteclad Noble in the 'Marsh of White Mist,' exit through a cave and find this spot on a wooden platform overlooking a chasm.

name: The Altar, Sandgate Village
description: Chapter 2: Near the 'Village Entrance' Shrine. Drop into a ravine, proceed through a cave, and find this spot near a dilapidated structure overlooking the Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw boss area.

name: The Deadwood, Rockrest Flat
description: Chapter 2: From the 'Rockrest Flat' Shrine, head left to an open area with a large tree near the cliffs; the Meditation Spot is nearby.

name: The Ravine, Rock Clash Platform
description: Chapter 2: From the 'Rock Clash Platform' Shrine, proceed forward to find this spot between two Buddha statues.

name: The Sculpture, Crouching Tiger Temple
description: Chapter 2: From the 'Temple Entrance' Shrine, ascend the stairs and enter the second opening on the left to find this spot before the main temple gate.

name: The Grotto, Yellow Wind Formation
description: Chapter 2: From the 'Cellar' Shrine, descend the slope, take the right path, and find this spot near an NPC carving stones.

name: The Rock, Sandgate Bound
description: Chapter 2: In the secret area 'Kingdom of Sahali,' from the 'Sandgate Bound' Shrine, head left to find this spot on a ridge overlooking the desert.

name: The Shade, Mirrormere
description: Chapter 3: From the 'Mirrormere' Shrine, head straight toward the frozen lake; the spot is atop a rock platform before the lake.

name: The Bottom, Pagoda Realm
description: Chapter 3: From the 'Outside the Wheel' Shrine, proceed through a cave, exit, and break a wooden fence near a golden container to find this spot.

name: The Statue, Precept Corridor
description: Chapter 3: From the 'Precept Corridor' Shrine, head forward; the spot is to the left after dropping from a wooden platform.

name: The Track, Mindfulness Cliff
description: Chapter 3: From the 'Mindfulness Cliff' Shrine, follow the path to the second encounter with the 'Non-White' boss; the spot is in the boss arena.

name: The Hall, New Thunderclap Temple
description: Chapter 3: From the 'Mahavira Hall' Shrine, descend the stairs, enter the Side Hall to the left, defeat the 'Non-Pure' boss, and find the spot inside.

name: The Carvings, Pool Of Shattered Jade
description: Chapter 4: From the 'Pool of Shattered Jade' Shrine, turn around to find the spot in the pond.

name: The Tree, Middle Hollow
description: Chapter 4: From the 'Middle Hollow' Shrine, turn around; the spot is opposite the shrine.

name: Cave Depths, Lower Hollow
description: Chapter 4: From the 'Lower Hollow' Shrine, turn left, enter a tunnel, squeeze through a wall crack, and find the spot.

name: The Height, Forest Of Ferocity
description: Chapter 4: From the 'Forest of Ferocity' Shrine, head left to find the spot at the cliff's edge.

name: The Pines, Temple Of Yellow Flowers
description: Chapter 4: From the 'Temple Entrance' Shrine, enter the temple, proceed slightly right through the gate, and find the spot.

name: The Ledge, Purple Cloud Mountain
description: Chapter 4: In the secret area 'Purple Cloud Mountain,' from the 'Valley of Blooms' Shrine, jump left into the water, proceed left through the woods to a Torii Gate, and find the spot up the hill.

name: The Relief, Camp Of Seasons
description: Chapter 5: From the 'Camp of Seasons' Shrine, cross two bridges, ascend the stairs on the right to find the spot.

name: The Buddha, The Emerald Hall
description: Chapter 5: After the 'Emerald Hall' Shrine, defeat the Yin-Yang Fish boss; the spot is at the hall's end opposite the throne.

name: The Crag, Ashen Pass III
description: Chapter 5: From the 'Ashen Pass III' Shrine, jump over rocks on the right to find the spot hidden behind.

name: The Screen, Purge Pit
description: Chapter 5: In the secret area 'Bishui Cave,' from the 'Purge Pit' Shrine, go down the path; the spot is on the left.
